full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YUL GYI DUG SEL BA'I YUL LHA'I GTOR 'BUL SMAN DPA' PO CHIG THUB BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(GTOR MA GTZANG SAR BZHAG ,'DI NYID YUL GYI DUG SEL BA'I YUL LHA'I GTOR 'BUL SMAN DPA' PO CHIG THUB CES BYA BA 'DI NI RIGS RUS SHIN TU MTHO ZHING LUGS ZUNG MKHYEN PA'I SPYAN DANG LDAN PA DANG DAD PA BRTAN DAM TSIG GTZANG MA TED D'A KHI LI PI I DA LAS TSU KHER DPON RIN PO CHE BDE LEGS PHUN TSOGS GTZO BYA NAS BLA CHEN RNAMS DANG, SHOG GI DPON SLOB 'BANGS MTHA' YAS PAS, ,KHO BO LA SNYING NYE BA'I SEMS KYIS SPRINGS YIG MAndAL KHA BTAGS DANG BCAS PA 'BYOR ZHU BA'I LAN DPE CHA GSAR DU SBYAR BA 'DI DANG BCAS PA DAD LDAN SLOB MA'I TSOGS RNAMS LA RIG 'DZIN SNYING 'DUS PA TE DZVA BADZRAS GTAMS PAR MDZAD TE SPRINGS PA'O, ,DGE 'DIS MTSON PA'I RNAM DKAR RNAMS KYIS YUL DE DANG GZHAN LA'ANG RDZOGS LDAN GYI DUS BZHIN DU BDE SKYID PHUN SUM TSOGS PA DANG TSE RING NAD MED BSOD NAMS RI BO BZHIN DU BRTAN PA'I RGYUR GYUR NAS, RGYAL BSTAN SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR TSE MTHA' YAS PA'I LUNG RTOGS KYI BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO YUL GYI MCHOG MOS LDAN DE NA DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
